articles.description: Australia’s post-pandemic rebound continues to accelerate thanks to low interest rates and economic growth leading to record levels of home buyer desire.
articles.content:
This strong economic growth is expected to see the unemployment rate decline to 5.0 per cent by yearend 2021 (from 5.6 per cent in March) and then to 4.7 per cent by yearend 2022.
The HSI showed hom… [+2318 chars]

articles.title: Company director behind tourism 'mecca' dream slapped with 20-year ban - ABC News
articles.description: A bid to turn Mission Beach and Dunk Island into a tourism hotspot is all but over with the man behind the scheme banned from fundraising and advertising financial products.
articles.content:
A bid to turn a small beachside area into Australia's next tourism mecca is all but over with the man behind the scheme banned from fundraising and advertising financial products for 20 years.

articles.author: James Frost
articles.title: Latitude hits the ASX with a $2.9b valuation - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: Shares in the non-bank lender led by Ahmed Fahour delivered IPO investors a stag profit of around 8 per cent in the third attempt at a listing.
articles.content: Formerly known as GE Finance, the business was purchased by a group of buyers in 2015. The listing has been achieved by selling 7.7 per cent of the company via the float at $2.60 a share, 10 per cent… [+2293 chars]
